clientbuilderswandtwo.midnightconfig.bui: Radius (in blocks) from player in which blocks can be placed
clientbuilderswandtwo.midnightconfig.blo: Max number of blocks that can be placed per tick
clientbuilderswandtwo.midnightconfig.fuz: Allow building off of any kind of block, instead of only that of the block that you right-clicked
clientbuilderswandtwo.midnightconfig.ign: Allow replacing fluids when building (water and lava)
Allow replacing plants when building (grass, Nether roots, etc.)
clientbuilderswandtwo.midnightconfig.pla: Allow building mid-air (servers may not like this!)
